title: No hextech chest after S-
body:
Hi
I just finished a ranked game.  Got S- on Udyr.  I've never gotten and S/S-/S+ on Udyr before too.  But at match end, I didn't get any chest!!  There was another player(Sivir) who got an S, but they got their chest?  
I did get 4 chest last month.  From my knowledge, you can only get 4 chests per month.  But today it should've reset?  or not?  Anyone with more info. plz shed some light in here.  :D  
Also, will I get a chest if I get S or above with Udyr in future?  or is it marked or something for this season?  :S

What happen rito???

Edit: i just checked my profile and in champions, the chest icon on Udyr is lit.  like 4 other champions for whom I've earned a chest.  I think this one is lost somehow!!!  
Can this be looked into?  :)
ty for ya time

replies.body:
Checked out your account and looks like you already earned a chest on Udyr last week which can happen when someone else from your group earns an S.
  
What this means for you is that since you already received a chest on Udyr this season, you wouldn't get chests anymore from playing Udyr until next season. 

If you're still curious how it all works,  check out the [Hextech Crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide on our support site, which has a lot of the general FAQ type information :D

I love how you have time to comment on these posts while tens of posts on mac client FPS dropping is completely ignored. Do you not care about these people desperately asking for updates on the issue? The game has been UNPLAYABLE for over 10 days now.

Uhm sorry that I make this question in here but couldn't find any other place to post about it.

So I have all the champions already and have quite a lot of IP saved, currently 15K and going up, I'm in no rush to get the keys or the chests, I find it exciting to have this sort of RNG feature in league, I really do, the thing is... champion loot means absolutely nothing for me :S if anything it feels like I wasted a key AND a chest, I can't get another chest on the champion I got it from and I have no use for the loot I got... I know it's RNG but old players like me probably feel very bad about champion loot.

I don't intend to rant but try to see it from our perspective, 6+ years with riot here and my support for you guys won't dabble one bit because of this, but just consider changing it somehow? even ward skins are a better option for us :S
Hold on to the champion shards, they said they are going to implement something to use them on for the people that own everyone.
Oh I never read that, good to know then!

RiotBok,

I hate to tell you but that page doesn't go any near into enough depth.  There is serious lack of clarity when it comes to Hextech.  I had a nice discussion with support about it but when I asked them to pass it along to the folks working on Hextech they said they can't do that.  WTF?!?!  Who ever heard of not letting support interact with development?
I believe it takes quite a while for the hextech chest to refresh so that you can earn another one. I wish Riot changed this. :(
probobly someone got s a game or 2 before when you were playing udyr...you can get a chest when someone else gets s from your team too...sry for spelling hope i helped
